original_title: ミュージカル『憂国のモリアーティ』Op.4 -犯人は二人-
overview: William James Moriarty and Sherlock Holmes both become entangled with the ruthless "blackmailing king", Charles Augustus Milverton. Both determined to deal with him, Sherlock finally comes face to face with the mystery he's chased and longed for: the Lord of Crime.
title: Musical "Moriarty the Patriot" Op.4 - The Two Criminals -
